name: The Race to the Big Race
name_original: The Race to the Big Race
description:
Help Robert the Tire find his lost friends as he rolls and jumps through 10 courses to make it to the big race.

CONTROLS

'A' - Left

'D' - Right

'Space' - Jump (Hold for higher jump)

CREDITS 
  • Programmer / Background Art / Music - Derek Golliher
  • Asset Art - Evan Golliher
